remarks: The identity function is a continuous function from one topology to another topology on the same set iff the domain is finer than the codomain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement: ssidcn $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> ( ( _I |` X ) e. ( J Cn K ) <-> K C_ J ) ) $.
